line.originaltext: 1 cup unsalted butter
1 cup crunchy peanut butter
1 cup white sugar
1 cup packed brown sugar
2 eggs
2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
1 teaspoon baking powder
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda
Cream together butter, peanut butter and sugars.
Cream together butter, peanut butter and sugars.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3}, ing9, "things in mixing bowl", "")

line.originaltext: Cream together butter, peanut butter and sugars.
Beat in eggs.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing4}, ing11, "things with eggs", "beat in eggs")

line.originaltext: In a separate bowl, sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In a separate bowl, sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
line.annotation: combine({ing5, ing6, ing7, ing8}, ing12, "dry ingredients", "sift together")

line.originaltext: In a separate bowl, sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Stir into batter.
Stir into batter.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing12}, ing13, "batter", "stir dry ingredients into batter")

line.originaltext: Put batter in refrigerator for 1 hour.
Put batter in refrigerator for 1 hour.
Put batter in refrigerator for 1 hour.
Roll into 1 inch balls and put on baking sheets.
Roll into 1 inch balls and put on baking sheets.
line.annotation: do(ing13, , ing14, "batter balls", "roll into 1 inch balls")

line.originaltext: Roll into 1 inch balls and put on baking sheets.
Flatten each ball with a fork, making a criss-cross pattern.
Flatten each ball with a fork, making a criss-cross pattern.
line.annotation: do(ing14, t4, ing15, "flattened", "flatten balls with fork, making criss-cross pattern")

line.originaltext: Bake in a preheated 375 degrees F oven for about 10 minutes or until cookies begin to brown.
Bake in a preheated 375 degrees F oven for about 10 minutes or until cookies begin to brown.
Bake in a preheated 375 degrees F oven for about 10 minutes or until cookies begin to brown.
Bake in a preheated 375 degrees F oven for about 10 minutes or until cookies begin to brown.
Do not over-bake.
Do not over-bake.
